headline: Disney Unveils New 2022 Pride Clothing Line for LGBTQ Children
author: Arjun Singh
sentences: The release comes as Disney is embroiled in a fierce controversy over its opposition to House Bill 1557, known as the Parental Rights in Education Bill.?
